Name: Crimson Butterfly 1
Desc: After the 1st turn, 1 Crimson Butterfly is summoned into battle. Defeat the Crimson Butterfly to earn massive points.

Name: Crimson Butterfly 2
Desc: After the 7th turn, 2 Crimson Butterflies are summoned into battle. Defeat the Crimson Butterflies to earn massive points.

Name: Primal Watcher 1
Desc: After the 1st turn, 2 Primal Watchers are summoned into battle. Defeating a Primal Watcher increases all Signal Orb DMG by 50% for 3 turns.

Name: Primal Watcher 2
Desc: After the 7th turn, 3 Primal Watchers are summoned into battle. Defeating a Primal Watcher increases all Signal Orb DMG by 50% for 3 turns.

Name: Hati 1
Desc: After the 1st turn, 3 Hatis are summoned into battle. Defeat a Hati to dissolve the entire row it belongs to.

Name: Hati 2
Desc: After the 7th turn, 3 mightier Hatis are summoned into battle. Defeat a Hati to dissolve the entire row it belongs to.

Name: Moon Grasp 1
Desc: After the 1st turn, 1 Moon Grasp is summoned into battle. Defeat a Moon Grasp to dissolve the entire column it belongs to.

Name: Moon Grasp 2
Desc: After the 5th turn, 2 Moon Grasps are summoned into battle. Defeat a Moon Grasp to dissolve the entire column that it is located.

Name: Moon Grasp 3
Desc: After the 10th turn, 3 Moon Grasps are summoned into battle. Defeat a Moon Grasp to dissolve the entire column it belongs to.

Name: (Dark) 1
Desc: After the 1st turn, 2 Shark-speare [Dark] are summoned into battle. Defeat a Shark-speare [Dark] to dissolve the entire row and column it belongs to.

Name: (Dark) 2

Name: (Dark) 3

Name: God Slayer
Desc: After the 1st turn, God Slayer is summoned into battle, reducing Red Orb DMG by 20% for 2 turns. Defeat God Slayer to dissolve the entire row it belongs to and remove the Red Orb DMG Reduction.

Name: Demon Bane
Desc: After the 5th turn, Demon Bane is summoned into battle, reducing Yellow Orb DMG by 30% for 2 turns. Defeat Demon Bane to dissolve the entire column it belongs to and remove the Yellow Orb DMG Reduction.

Name: Heaven Breaker
Desc: After the 10th turn, Heaven Breaker is summoned into battle, reducing Blue Orb DMG by 30% for 2 turns. Defeat Heaven Breaker to dissolve the entire row and column it belongs to and remove the Blue Orb DMG Reduction.

Name: Heart
Desc: After the 1st turn, 4 Hearts are summoned into battle, each reducing Red Orb DMG by 5% permanently. Each time a Heart is defeated, removes 1 stack of Red Orb DMG Reduction and permanently increases Red Orb DMG by 5%.

Name: Spade
Desc: After the 4th turn, 4 Spades are summoned into battle, each reducing Yellow Orb DMG by 7.5% permanently. Each time a Spade is defeated, removes 1 stack of Yellow Orb DMG Reduction and permanently increases Yellow Orb DMG by 5%.

Name: Diamond
Desc: After the 7th turn, 4 Diamonds are summoned into battle, each reducing Blue Orb DMG by 7.5% permanently. Each time a Diamond is defeated, removes 1 stack of Blue Orb DMG Reduction and permanently increases Blue Orb DMG by 5%.

Name: Club
Desc: After the 10th turn, 4 Clubs are summoned into battle, each reducing Basic Attack Orb DMG by 7.5% permanently. Each time a Club is defeated, removes 1 stack of Basic Attack Orb DMG Reduction and permanently increases Basic Attack Orb DMG by 5%.
